    • tokenize

      public List<Token> tokenize(String input, boolean wantWhitespace) throws ParserException, InvalidNumberFormatException, MaximumNumberOfDecimalExceededException
      Matches every known token in the input
      Parameters:
      input - The input expression as a string
      wantWhitespace - Flag that indicates if whitespaces should be ignored or not
      Returns:
      a list of tokens extracted from the expression
      Throws:
      InvalidTokenException - If the token is not of any known type
      ParserException
      InvalidNumberFormatException
      MaximumNumberOfDecimalExceededException

    • generateRPN

      public List<Token> generateRPN(List<Token> tokens) throws ParserException
      Generates the reverse polish notation of the expression
      Parameters:
      tokens - The tokens of the expression
      Returns:
      A list of token in the reverse polish notation
      Throws:
      ParenthesisCountException - If the number of opening parenthesis is greater than the number of closing parenthesis or otherwise
      ParserException

    • processOperators

      public Token processOperators(Token token, Stack<Token> stack) throws ParserException, InvalidNumberFormatException, MaximumNumberOfDecimalExceededException, DivisionByZeroException
      Processes an operator and its operands
      Parameters:
      token - The token to be processed
      Returns:
      A token
      Throws:
      ParenthesisCountException - If the number of opening parenthesis is greater than the number of closing parenthesis or otherwise
      InitializationExpectedException - If the token is a assignment operator but there is no right operand
      ParserException
      InvalidNumberFormatException
      MaximumNumberOfDecimalExceededException
      DivisionByZeroException

    • computeRPN

      public Value computeRPN(List<Token> tokens) throws ParserException, InvalidNumberFormatException, MaximumNumberOfDecimalExceededException, DivisionByZeroException
      Computes the reverse polish notation to obtain a value of the tokenized expression
      Parameters:
      tokens - A list of tokens in the reverse polish notation
      Returns:
      A value
      Throws:
      BadSyntaxException - If after the processing of the reverse polish notation there are tokens left in the stack
      ParserException
      InvalidNumberFormatException
      MaximumNumberOfDecimalExceededException
      DivisionByZeroException
